defaultMessage: Click on a candidate's name to see full candidate committee information, as well as detailed donations and expenditures, at illinoissunshine.org.

Notes: 'Total raised' represents a committee's total available funds to spend this quarter. While committees are able to spend money continuously, they are only required to report spending figures once every three months. As soon as spending figures are available, they are reflected in the 'Cash on hand' amount for each candidate.
